game.miscDetails: Mame uses the jamma standard for button numbering and thus all of the mk games are completely off. The games buttons were arranged in a cross pattern with block the center of the 'X' high and low punch on the left and high and low kick on the right respectively. The Run button is placed inthe lower left hand corner, similar to a mamers 'modified neogeo' layout. It is highly reccomended that you write ctrlr files for these games if you intend to play them.
